alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marion, northwestern Fayette and northern Lamar Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brinn to Beaverton. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Winfield, Fayette, Sulligent, Guin, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Beaverton, Gu- Win, Bluff, Blooming Grove, Lamar County Airport, Brinn, Lake Buttahatchee, Crews, Twin, Tucker, Wayside, Pine Springs and Marion County Public Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
